name: Web Crawler
description: The Application crawls the webpages and stores the metadata politley.
content: The Application has total 3 componentns (UI, 2 backend Micro Services) The UI Framework is developed using React JS. And, backend Micro Services are developed using Spring Boot.

name: My Portfolio App
description: The Application which you are accessing right now :)
content: This is a static Web Application that has been developed using Angular 8.

name: Feature Flags
description: Developed the Feature Flag implementation using Launch Darkly to enable and disable features on fly.
content: Application has been developed using Spring Boot and Used Launch Darkly Client to enable and disable feature flags.
